response.overview: Bunyau and Mujap are brothers who live in a longhouse in Tembawai Kanyuk. Known for being extremely mischievous, their constant pranks often cause trouble for the villagers. One day, they finally cross the line and overdo their antics, leading to them being kicked out of Tembawai Kanyuk by the Tuai Rumah, Empeting. Forced to leave their home, the two brothers head to the city, where they must learn how to survive, adapt, and face a series of hilarious and unexpected challenges in an unfamiliar environment.
response.title: Bunyau & Mujap: The Movie
